With <math display="inline">G = \left( V, E \right)</math> and <math display="inline">H= \left( W, F \right)</math> being graphs, we say that <math display="inline">H</math> is an induced subgraph when <math display="inline">W \subseteq V</math> and <math display="inline">F = \left\{ x \mathrel{\bullet  \! {-} \! \bullet} y \in E: x, y \in W\right\}</math>
